p: Additionally, the internal C-C bond of piperidine was removed to yield 37 4-amino-2-piperidones, including 50– 61, which were screened for T. brucei growth inhibition at a single dose (1 μM or 10 μM). Eleven compounds ( 50– 60) showed decreased activity in the T. brucei growth inhibition assay by showing more than 80% inhibition at 10 μM; 61 with a methoxy on the C-5 of the indole ring showed better activity with ~60% inhibition at 1 μM ( Table 1).
